*[[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] 802.11ad module (M.2 1216) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCA9008-SBD1 PPD-QCA9008-SBD1] (2015-08-19) :1T1R 802.11ad QCA9500 (4.6Gbps) *[[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-TBD1]] 802.11abgn/ac/ad + BT module (NGFF) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCA9008-TBD1 PPD-QCA9008-TBD1] (2015-08-17)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/review-tp-link-talon-ad7200-80211ad-router-review-blazing-ahead-60ghz ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Router'' on '''HardwareZone'''] :while the single stream 60GHz radio is by powered by Qualcommâ€™s QCA9500 chipset *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33009-tp-link-talon-ad7200-multi-band-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Multi-Band Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 256 MB :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*60GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9500 1x1 (AD4600) ::- [[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] module
